Question_1.Context: The table below shows the fatty acid composition of different fruit seed kernels after detoxification.
Question_1.Question: Which fruit seed kernel has the highest percentage of total unsaturated fatty acids?
Question_1.Source: Total unsaturated fatty acids (TUSFA) for Apricot: 89.16 ±0.17A, Peach: 89.00 ±0.10A, Mango: 48.03 ±0.02B. Apricot has the highest percentage of total unsaturated fatty acids.
